 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדָא‎</span>] **verb** ==drive away, thrust aside== (\|\| form of  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נדה‎</span>, q. v., or textual error; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***drive*** cattle, etc.); — only **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וידא ֗֗֗ אֶתיִֿשְׂרָאֵל מֵאַחֲרֵי י‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.21|2Kgs 17:21]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַדַּח‎</span> √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נדח‎</span> **Hiph\`il**). 

 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדָה‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==put away, exclude== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el (***excommunicate***) Hithpa\`el Niph\`al; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***nadû***</u></abbr>, ***throw***, ***overthrow***, ***destroy***, etc., [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 448 f.</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְֿנַדִּים לְיוֺם רַע‎</span> [[Amos.6.3|Amos 6:3]] ***they that thrust off the evil day*** (i.e. refuse to think of it); literal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַדֵּיכֶם‎</span> [[Isa.66.5|Isa 66:5]] ***thrust away, exclude*** from association in worship (on usage see [[BDB#Che|Che]]).
